title: Looking for people to play with.
body: Hey guys im just looking for cool people to play league with really, pretty bored usually heaps of time to play at night and on weekends, also not really keen to play with super serious people, want to have a good laugh playing, so add me on league BrySkuxx, also always on skype or teamspeak either one really, cheers :)

replies.body: Im keen to play with you but im B5 :( Add me if u like to play with me Tony38nz
